mapper.update:
UPDATE AC_OPERATOR_SHORTCUT
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_operator = #{guid_operator,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_func = #{guid_func,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_funcgroup = #{guid_funcgroup,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_app = #{guid_app,jdbcType=varchar},
order_no = #{order_no,jdbcType=decimal},
image_path = #{image_path,jdbcType=varchar},
shortcut_key = #{shortcut_key,jdbcType=varchar}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
